analysis: The project has a Christmas-themed UI but lacks mobile responsiveness. The navigation menu is not optimized for mobile devices, and the design does not adapt well to smaller screens. The CSS file needs updates to include responsive design principles, and the HTML file should incorporate a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.

improvements.description: Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Update CSS to include responsive design principles, ensuring the layout adapts to various screen sizes.
Fix the SVG data URL to include proper SVG content for Egyptian-themed patterns.
